pages.text: Welcome to basic rocket creation.$(br2)A simple crafting table is too unsophisticated to be restricted to merely 9 material slots.....$(br)There is no way a rocket can be made in the same place one makes a mere hoe!$(br2)It's time to make a table worthy of rocket creation.

pages.title: Rocket Builder
pages.text: $(br)A workbench that can handle the extreme and extraterrestrial materials to produce one of the most legendary methods of travel ever.
